title: Robustness
description: Organizations developing or operating AI systems should be held accountable for their proper functioning.

title: Accountability
description: AI System must perform consistently and safely under noisy and dianamic cicumstances and not pose reasonable safety risks

title: Data Quality
description: AI systems should respect data privacy and avoid using customer data beyond its intended and stated use.

title: Bias and Fairness
description: AI systems should be explainable to ensure that people understand AI-based outcomes and can challenge them.

title: Robustness
description: AI systems must function in a robust, secure, and safe way throughout their life cycles

title: You Can Start Alone
description: But Later You Will Need a Team
